name: Dragon Dreams
description:
In Dragon Dreams, you must feed the dragon until he falls asleep.

When the dragon dreams, his dreams turn into reality, and in this case, invaluable coins !

Collect them, but watch out for bandits !

How To Play 
WASD to Move
Left Mouse Button to Attack Moose/Bandits
E to Feed the dragon when you have meat in your inventory
Tab to check your inventory of coins and meat
Escape to Quit to Desktop
